text: Klara Post (born 5 July 1926) was a Dutch gymnast. She competed in the women's artistic team all-around event at the 1948 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the Netherlands Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Arnhem
title: Klara Post
